\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
A collection of \mbox{\hyperlink{classit_1_1unical_1_1mat_1_1embasp_1_1base_1_1InputProgram}{Input\+Program}} and \mbox{\hyperlink{classit_1_1unical_1_1mat_1_1embasp_1_1base_1_1OptionDescriptor}{Option\+Descriptor}}. The subclasses have to implement \mbox{\hyperlink{}{start\+Async(\+Callback, List, List)}} and \mbox{\hyperlink{}{start\+Sync(\+List, List)}} methods. Each instance inside \mbox{\hyperlink{classit_1_1unical_1_1mat_1_1embasp_1_1base_1_1Handler_a62300affa0165e929a5d37dd58d0fdab}{programs}} and \mbox{\hyperlink{classit_1_1unical_1_1mat_1_1embasp_1_1base_1_1Handler_abb90ae42e6824d858f68481b9d1ba686}{options}} are represented by an integer (id) , respectively.

\begin{DoxySeeAlso}{See also}
Array\+List 

Hash\+Map 

List 

Map 
\end{DoxySeeAlso}
